snippet: U.S. coach Jurgen Klinsmann says his son should apologize to Landon Donovan for a "disrespectful" tweet after the U.S. star was cut from the World Cup roster....

headline.print_headline: Klinsmann Angry Over Son's Tweet About Donovan
headline.main: Klinsmann Angry Over Son's Tweet About Donovan

lead_paragraph: U.S. coach Jurgen Klinsmann says his son should apologize to Landon Donovan for a "disrespectful" tweet after the U.S. star was cut from the World Cup roster.
